ValidationRule.description: You cannot move the Contact Status to Demo Scheduled without inserting a Date in the Scheduled Demo Date Field
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISCHANGED(Status__c), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Demo Scheduled'), ISBLANK(Scheduled_Demo_Date__c), CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name, 'SMB'), ISBLANK(ADR_Transfer_By__c), ISBLANK(Hot_Transfer_To__c), OR(ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'List Import (no prior engagement)'), ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'Outbound call / email / linkedin')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot move the Contact Status to Demo Scheduled without inserting a Date in the Scheduled Demo
